item.title: Switch Tech Stacks: Boost Your Career Growth
item.description: My humble effort on managing your career Link to heading A few months ago, I switched jobs. As part of this move, I have changed my daily programming language from C#, which I have been using for over eight years, to Java. It might confuse some people and raise a few eyebrows here and there asking why I would drop my experience just to start with a new language.
